name: Fight Team Rivals - Be An MMA Manager
name_original: Fight Team Rivals - Be An MMA Manager
description:
Combining simple but deep management gameplay with fast and furious fights. Train your team, challenge the world, be the best!

Fight Team Rivals is a pick-up-and-play MMA management game where you create your own Fight Team. Recruit your fighters, train them in the world's most brutal combat disciplines & techniques, then set them loose to take on the world!

Guide your team of elite MMA fighters through the FTR ranks to earn championship gold. Win belts, dominate your friends and watch the devastation unfold!

FEATURES
- Manage your own unique Fight Team and train them through the ranks.
- Master authentic martial arts moves across 6 brutal disciplines.
- Watch your fighters take to the ring in exciting, fast and furious events.
- Develop the ultimate MMA gym, installing equipment and hiring specialist staff.
- Set up the winning game plan to give your team the tactical edge.
- Compete in over 80 events to bring home the Championship Belts.
- Huge variety of event types, from traditional tournaments to epic tag-team encounters.
- Set up fights against real opponents from all over the world.
- Challenge your friends and compete in intense team-vs-team rivalries.

MANAGE YOUR OWN FIGHT TEAM
Build a balanced team of elite martial artists, teaching them authentic moves across multiple disciplines. Keep your fighters in the best shape to compete by building up the ultimate MMA gym and hiring specialist trainers and support staff. Experiment with different fight plans to discover the perfect tactics for your team.

TURN THEM INTO CHAMPIONS
Take part in official FTR Championship events, covering all kinds of fighting styles and a huge variety of event types, including single discipline tournaments, style-vs-style showcases and asymmetric tag-team showdowns. Each series culminates in a special 1v1 Championship Belt fight for the ultimate team glory.

TAKE ON REAL OPPONENTS
Exhibition Fights let players test their fighters against other players from all over the world. You can also take on your friends in Rivals mode. Here the goal is to dominate the opposing Fight Team in an ongoing contest for bragging rights.
